group_1.textRight: Thank goodness, you're awake...!
Anything wrong? Is your body okay?@It didn't take you over, did it?

group_1.textLeft: *Sob*...ugh...@I was tryin' to make it easy...
Killin' my parents, trickin' you guys...@I'm...just the worst...
I deserve to be unhappy.@There's no point...in livin' anymore...

group_1.textRight: I want you to be happy, Felicia.
And there's plenty of things worth living for.

group_1.textLeft: All I do is cause trouble for you, Yachiyo!

group_1.textRight: Yes you do, every single morning you refuse to@get out of bed, and you're always being so selfish.
But you know what? You melted my frozen heart.
When I kept losing my friends, you and everyone else here gave me hope.
That's why I'm so grateful to have you as part of my family.
I can't wait to see how you will grow.
So don't tell me it's not worth it.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad, but...@What do I do about this...!?

group_1.textRight: Every one of us has our regrets that we reflect on,@and we all try to change ourselves little by little.
And you're no different, Felicia.
Whether you're working at Banbanzai or staying at Mikazuki Villa, you've been changing, too!
...I mean growing.@Little by little, without a doubt, nice and steady!
You studied hard and got a 60 in Japanese,@and you've even taught Ui.
Yeah, I love studying together with you, Felicia.
And all the games we play, too!
You know, Felicia, when you're there with us,@the whole house gets a lot brighter.
So I would like it if you stayed...
It would make me happy too.
When I became an Uwasa, there was something@you said, Felicia:
"I don't want anyone leaving me ever again."
That made me so happy...@And now I'm going to say the same...
Don't leave me, Felicia.

group_1.textLeft: Daddy and Mommy will...definitely hold a grudge against me...

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness...I made it in time...
You always sleep with this stuffed animal@in your arms, right...?
I think it's a part of your love,
but also the love from your father and mother.
So I think you can rest assured...
I have never felt that kind of love reciprocated@from someone before.
But rest assured, Felicia,
your father and mother love you very much...
And you know,@I think the one that's filled with the most love...
is the girl who tried to give it to her [textYellow:Kimochi].@It's Felicia, herself.
Yeah.

group_1.narration: Tsuruno hugged you.@Yachiyo dried your hair.@You ate the lunch I made.@You held a pencil while studying with Ui.@You built a house with Sana and userName.
All of these memories with everyone,@all of the love you've been given by everyone, all of it.@It's all a part of the one body you have.
There's something else in there, too.@The love from Felicia's parents.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure you know yourself that you're a big bundle@of everyone's love.
And the love we give you will never ever change.
Even if you're suffering from your sins,@we'll all carry it together.

group_1.textLeft: Besides, I should be takin' good care of it...
It's the body Daddy and Mommy gave me, after all...
